name: PPN Keluaran
query:
SELECT
    si.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
    c.tax_id AS "Tax ID::100",
    si.name AS "Invoice Name:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
    si.tax_invoice_number AS "Tax Invoice Number::150",
    si.posting_date AS "Posting Date:Date:100",
    si.total_taxes_and_charges AS "Total Taxes and Charges:Currency:150"
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice` si
LEFT JOIN
    `tabCustomer` c ON si.customer = c.name
WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1
ORDER BY
    si.posting_date DESC
